events.TH North 1F Red Jail Carpenter:
'TH North 1F Red Jail Gerudo' and
                ((gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and (Small_Key_Thieves_Hideout, 4))
                    or (gerudo_fortress == 'fast' and Small_Key_Thieves_Hideout))

exits.Thieves Hideout Gerudo Warrior:
(gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and 
                'TH North 1F Red Jail Carpenter' and 'TH South 1F Olive Jail Carpenter'
                and 'TH South 2F Blue Jail Carpenter' and 'TH North 2F Green Jail Carpenter')
                    or (gerudo_fortress == 'fast' and 'TH North 1F Red Jail Carpenter')

exits.Thieves Hideout Kitchen Rear:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                Gerudo_Membership_Card or can_use(Bow) or logic_gerudo_kitchen

exits.Thieves Hideout Kitchen Front:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                Gerudo_Membership_Card or can_use(Bow) or logic_gerudo_kitchen

events.TH South 1F Olive Jail Carpenter:
'TH South 1F Olive Jail Gerudo' and
                (gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and (Small_Key_Thieves_Hideout, 4))

exits.Thieves Hideout Gerudo Warrior:
gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and
                'TH North 1F Red Jail Carpenter' and 'TH South 1F Olive Jail Carpenter' and
                'TH South 2F Blue Jail Carpenter' and 'TH North 2F Green Jail Carpenter'

events.TH South 2F Blue Jail Carpenter:
'TH South 2F Blue Jail Gerudo' and
                (gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and (Small_Key_Thieves_Hideout, 4))

exits.Thieves Hideout Gerudo Warrior:
gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and
                'TH North 1F Red Jail Carpenter' and 'TH South 1F Olive Jail Carpenter' and
                'TH South 2F Blue Jail Carpenter' and 'TH North 2F Green Jail Carpenter'

events.TH North 2F Green Jail Carpenter:
'TH North 2F Green Jail Gerudo' and
                (gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and (Small_Key_Thieves_Hideout, 4))

exits.Thieves Hideout Gerudo Warrior:
gerudo_fortress == 'normal' and
                'TH North 1F Red Jail Carpenter' and 'TH South 1F Olive Jail Carpenter' and
                'TH South 2F Blue Jail Carpenter' and 'TH North 2F Green Jail Carpenter'
